name: Mr.Space!!
description:
One of the very popular "Mr." series!
No.1 in many countries!
**Features
The "Mr." series returns with an all-new, pick-up-and-play
adventure filled with excitement and exhilaration for everyone.
Presenting... "Mr. Space!!"
Your dexterity is the key to survival!
Locate the exit, and run for it!
Simple controls meet nail-biting tension in one dynamic action game!

**Facts
Ranked 1st in USA, Japan,Canada,The UK and Australia.
Moreover, it is raising the popularity in Europe and Taiwan!

**App store user reviews
Takes no time to learn how to play. Very well put together, extremely simple, and super addicting!
Very good game, sometimes simple things are just better
It really keeps you on your toe! And keep your mind moving.
This simple formula, combined with pounding, driving music, really pushes you to play your best. It creates a true sense of accomplishment,
and a satisfying feeling of defeat as well.

**Media Reviews
"Mr. Space!!" may seem easy at first but the difficulty starts ramping up around level 25.
Soon you'll be making split second judgments and hitting that replay button to try and top your last high score.
A time waster worth checking out.(App Spy.com)
"Mr. Space!!" continues the Mr. tradition of highly energetic music, encouraging sound effects,
and of course the constantly moving grid background.(Touch Arcade)

**[How to Play]
1. Find the hidden "Space".
2. Escape.
3. It’s that simple! ...Or is it?
You've got two lives.
Escape your way to the top score!
- Easy-to-use controls and intuitive gameplay.
- Daily rankings and global leaderboards.
- Enjoy everyday with today's ranking!
- Multifunctional keypad mode.
